title: Journal of Natural & Ayurvedic Medicine (JONAM)
description: MedWin is an open access Publishers on the latest research in the fields of Dental, pediatrics, diabetes, ophthalmology, Orthopedics, Biotechnology, virology.
cleaned_text: Journal of Natural & Ayurvedic Medicine (JONAM) is specifically designed to provide researchers around the world with the most recent topics pertaining to Ayurvedic medicine. Ayurvedic medicine uses a variety of products and practices, which may contain herbs, minerals, or metals. JONAM invites authors to submit their Original Articles, Reviews, Clinical Perspectives, Short Communications, News, Case Reports, Proceedings, and Health Policies etc. JONAM answers the complete information needs of practitioners concerned with evolution in research related to Ayurvedic medicine. The scope of the journal is to provide an international opportunity for encouraging noble discussions and thus contributing the best understanding of Ayurvedic medicine & benefiting readers, authors with the research information upon this topic.
